column3: “Smoked this with my Nana and great Uncle Pete while on winter vacation. Very nice stuff. Got me high pretty quickly and I didn't really feel any negatives. 8/10 would recommend. Good with helping aches and pains and soreness. Made me forget how much my back hurt from sleeping on an air mattress. It also helps lower my stress level from seeing family I don't normally see and actually talking with them.”

“Oh. My. God.

Got a half O from a friend and I rolled up three proper fatties, and in the fattest of the 3, I put probably about half a gram of kief from the last 3 months I've saved up.

Gotta tell ya, this is some quality shit. Great strain, heaviness in back of eyes, euphoric body and head high. Taking me a while to type this. My ribs feel warm and fuzzy.”

“This is an aromatic blend that has notes of cedar, lemon and apple ... a really wonderful taste through my Davinci Ascent (typically use a Volcano but the Ascent is easy and portable).     The vapor at 350 degrees is hardly discernable ... but don't be fooled, the high rises quickly and for me, a small dose (half-filled Ascent chamber and 3-4 draws) is just perfect.

The high is super quick and very mellow.    The ta...”

“I have multiple health issues CFIDS, Fibromyalgia,  multiple ruptured discs with spinal impinging and after 8yrs of being sick and the medical community unable to help me I tried Cannabis. I would have tried it sooner but it's illegal in this state.
I prefer Sativa strains because they provide me with the ability to deal with the depression,  chronic physical pain, muscle spasms, and give me a bit of energy, I normal...”

“Sour Lemon OG is one of my favorite og's. The smell is very strong. The smoke is a big hitter that hits the head real quick. With the onset of the body high immediately a creative buzz unites for a lingering experience that won't disappoint.”
“Light sweet high. I feel like I can focus on anything! FUCK RITALIN- LEMON OG!”
“Taste like candy and it is very smooth”
“Amazing high. THE Best strain I've ever smoked. Hits hard though.”

“Surprisingly sour aftertaste that follows its very lemon taste with a mix of lime up front. Very pungent and about 70% sativa dominant for that energetic and uplifted high that can be channeled into a creative or motivated episode to help you get sh*t done. I use this for during the day to help me focus on my work and keep my scatter brain in check.”

“Picked up some live sugar and shatter wax of this strain.  Tasty, citrusy flavor. Felt like I had a ton of energy and was super focused.  Made me a bit chatty...  Great smoke for a day outside or if you just need to clean the house.”

“First off this bud smells absolutely amazing. When the bud tender showed me this I knew I had to get it. Boy this strain lived up to its og standards. Its perfect lemon sour taste like a lemon drop. Great head high for sure! Also some indica so it got me chill.”

“My number one favorite strain-hands down-no questions asked! But I'll give you reasons galore anyway...

While a drawback of this strain is that it hits hard, it hits good hard. not the kind that you cough so hard you pee your pants. good hard-that by the time you are done coughing you arrive”
“Awesome strain! Once again, great for anxiety and depression, awesome taste, heavy smell, smells awesome being burned, great for muscle spasms and skeletal pain.”

“I’ve never reviewed a strain on here before, nor do I feel educated enough on the subject to do so. However I have enough experience to know that this strain is the absolute BEST mid-day, pick-me-up, strain I’ve ever smoked. I was so fried the colonel would have been proud, and I still felt like I could have aced a job interview if need be (minus the piss test of course). I tend to get anxious when smoking sativa dom...”

“Shit had me shlumppped, great tasting, great smelling and fantastic hight. 
It made me very sleepy, Negative/Positive depending on how you see it.”
“So good. Paranoia, dry mouth and eyes did affect a lot. I was tripping balls tho”

“This is one of the best flower i ever had before, perfect smell, super sweet, u can smell and taste the lemon out of it, the high is perfect, go from a brain high to a total body high in seconds, u can feel the hit really quit, i found this strain perfect for my Sciatica pain, stress and for stay relaxed.”

“Strong lemon scent. Very earthy in taste and dark in color. LOUD. Provides a clear active high. It's a potent Sativa with the euphoric comedown of an indica. Long lasting and perfect for daytime activities. Would definitely recommend for a boost in mood and creativity.”
“So good. Paranoia, dry mouth and eyes did affect a lot. I was tripping balls tho”
“increeible body high sensations. waves of pleasure down my spine.”

“I’ve never reviewed a strain on here before, nor do I feel educated enough on the subject to do so. However I have enough experience to know that this strain is the absolute BEST mid-day, pick-me-up, strain I’ve ever smoked. I was so fried the colonel would have been proud, and I still felt like I could have aced a job interview if need be (minus the piss test of course). I tend to get anxious when smoking sativa dom...”

“I'm not too big on Sativa Highs but the one you get from this is amazing. It made me really focus on the television, I felt like my head was the TV and my body just want anywhere around. It has a very good Sweetish Sourish Taste. The actual buds smell delicious and are very sticky. Dope Strain”

“had this for bro weekend. 

ended up staying awake until 6 AM, made a cake, and put a frozen turkey on a ski lift. 

like caffeine but in weed form. 

10/10 would do again.”
“Tingly. Lots of upliftment and ideas. Slightly horny. Super  talkative and relaxed. With more usage dry eyes and bit lazy.”

“This stuff is stanky. Smells like lemon and tastes like some kind of lemon candy. Really potent Sativa. The strain was actually Sour Lemon Skittles, but this was the closest I could find on the internet.”
“Tingly. Lots of upliftment and ideas. Slightly horny. Super  talkative and relaxed. With more usage dry eyes and bit lazy.”

“This is one of the best flower i ever had before, perfect smell, super sweet, u can smell and taste the lemon out of it, the high is perfect, go from a brain high to a total body high in seconds, u can feel the hit really quit, i found this strain perfect for my Sciatica pain, stress and for stay relaxed.”
“increeible body high sensations. waves of pleasure down my spine.”
“Delightful strain. 1 joint had me feeling g like the was a leprechaun looking for his pot o gold in me brain.”
“Favorite strain”
“fucked up and silly”

“This is pure amazement! I used it as oil in a pen and 4-5 good hits I’m goooood. It helps me sleep so much, I only woke up ONCE last night and I got 8+ hours in! Also made me so happy and positive, and talkative. If you’re doing tasks you’ll find ways to make it so positive and easy. Really relaxing”
“Strong but clear-headed high and a nice aroma. I love socialising or watching films while watching this because I'm able to stay switched on and chatty while feeling relaxed :)”

“Nice, even head high. You'll feel it totally the onset it quick, it'll keep you focused but a little lofty also if that makes sense. I'm watching a pretty brain using movie you really gotta focus. I'm mostly glued so it works.  I vaped it so you can taste the strain. It's worth it if you come across it at your dispensary.”
“One of the best sativas out there.”
“a tasty, tangy treat”
“One of the best strains I have ever smoked. When ground, it is almost like powder with a very strong aroma.”
“flame”

“Aromatic and nice to look at, this strain stays true to its sativa family and gives you a burst of energy. I used this before an intense cram session before a test and my focus was that of a college kid on adderall. Good for wake and bakes or on your most productive daze". (Keep yourself hydrated
“Great for my chronic pain. It can definitely pack a punch if you aren't too careful so if recommend doing small amounts at first until you know how your body will react”
“Totally comfortable high, relaxed, attentive, happy. Nice head high as well.”
“this is the best I've ever had it made me so happy and I laughed at everything and even my mental state after my high was gone made me so relaxed and chilled”
“Super lemon/lime taste too it. Has a very good happy vibe.”

“This strain is absolutely delicious.

First, the smell: simply crisp and clean, evoking a sensation of clearheadedness.

Next, the smoke - also very clean, not too dry.

The high is stimulating, but not speedy. It is relaxing, but not groggy or prone to couch lock.

I appreciate a creativity boost and a proneness toward action and spontaneity.

Some things I noted: a moderate, but not extreme, increase in paranoia, b...”
“This is definitely in my top 5 list. I chose this strain cos it listed giggly" as a positive effect

“This is pure amazement! I used it as oil in a pen and 4-5 good hits I’m goooood. It helps me sleep so much, I only woke up ONCE last night and I got 8+ hours in! Also made me so happy and positive, and talkative. If you’re doing tasks you’ll find ways to make it so positive and easy. Really relaxing”
“Favorite strain”

“This strain can be summed up in one simple phrase. “wow.” This strain gives you a heady amount of happiness, one big appetite, and some nice hints of euphoria. Great for a wake n’ bake, but also works fantastic for a late night smoke sesh. All in all, put this one on your bucket list. Would smoke again.”
“Absolute fire🔥 realky goid clean strain to me. Makes my chest feel really light”
“Great feeling. Solid batch of product”
“This strain blew me away like no other. The most crystals ive seen on any bud and has tons of orange hairs, great daytime use.”
“fucked up and silly”
“Delightful strain. 1 joint had me feeling g like the was a leprechaun looking for his pot o gold in me brain.”
“A good OG indeed”
“smooth knockout.”
“Gorgeous buds, very light and soft. Smells just like lemon pledge!”

“Love this strain.  Quick hitting and feels like a sativa.  Come down is nice and relaxing without the couch lock.  Think lighter than OG Kush or Gorilla Glue #4.  Mood shifter for sure.  Sometimes I also get an out of body experience... which is cool for me.  Would love to take this while at a dance club or making out.  :)   It will also kick out headaches in a flash.”
“Calming and talkative”

“Holy wow, got 7 grams of this super sticky, gummy, amazingly scented wax and two small dabs later I'm slack-jawed and staring at my TV screen. Surprised by a low-moderate munchies craving, I had wobbly legs and an incredibly satisfied mindset, crawled into bed and slept beautifully. The stickiness could definitely be a pain but once in a suitable container it's no longer an issue. Highly recommended!”
“Really nice body high really hungry yet feels amazing ,love sour lemon og!”
“I finished my last gram of This in concentrate form. Definitely mellows you out. Good at the end of a long day”
“Gave me motivation to get all my shit done, but still kept me unbelievably relaxed.”
“Dense buds with an amazing scent!”
“love the taste”
“Fvckin fine”
“Light buds that are bright green. Smells amazing. Not my favorite bud because its not very dense, but the smoke is so uplifting.”

“This wonderful lemony OG is the palate cleanser both in the way it taste and the effect on the body. Whether it's been a series of  a sativa mind/energy fix or an indica body/pain management strain, this one will balance it all out. I enjoyed using the Sour Lemon OG as a way to transition between indica and sativa strains. My MS was happy to get some much needed sleep without the dude where's my car" loopy-ness.  I ...”"
“Had a wonderful vape session with this oil on my ssv. Played some Dark Souls, listened to some Neurosis, Alpinist, and Skeletonwitch, and all was well in my world.”
“Love this strain. Gives you a happy, talkative high. Relieves anxiety, good for social situations”
“Very Good. Makes me feel with energy and relaxed in the same time. Always good vibes. I recommend.”

“Had 2 Bowl hits and was completely paranoid wanted to throw up and I'm not a lightweight either. Passed out in front of a school. Tastes good its smooth. I'm just pretty sure it was laces, but it still makes you paranoid laced or not”

“I were smoking this a couple days ago... And well the taste were fantastic. And except for the taste being fantastic the body high were even greater it took me on an adventure. it felt like i left my body and flew away. It felt like i were an alien in a human body at that i would crawl out of it like a butterfly from it's thingy. I were free and it lasted for like 2 hours. And eating sour food while being stoned wer ...”
